title: [K-12] Enhancing Secondary Science Education Competencies through Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment using mobile tools similar to WhatsApp in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) settings, emphasizing real-world problem-solving skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to independently perform 10-minute microlearning content at least three times weekly using mobile devices.
Learners will be able to form and assign roles in science inquiry project teams with two or more peers using online collaboration tools.
Learners will be able to analyze science data collected via mobile devices and write reports applicable to real-life contexts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
